name: Rhune
description:
This game was created for the 48 hour FIT GameJam 2022.2.

The ingredients were:
- Genius Loci
- Runes
- Remote
- Zero

----

Changelog:

v1.1 (2022-11-07, ~8 hours after game jam end):
- Improved balance, especially in the early game (now it should be beatable)
- Added more waves (now 15)
- Added a maximum limit of 5 towers per type to encourage variety
- Various UI/UX improvements
- Stability improvements and bugfixes
